name: Ice Canyon
description: A canyon carved through ice creates a unique, beautiful landscape with potential access to ancient frozen remains, but the unstable ice walls can collapse without warning. The blue ice can be harvested for water, while the depths may hide frozen creatures or artifacts.
atmosphere: Unique, beautiful landscape carved through ice. World of blue ice and ancient frozen remains. Crisp air scented of ice and ancient secrets. Unstable ice walls can collapse without warning. Blue ice can be harvested for water. Depths hide frozen creatures or artifacts.
